bibl.title: P. Haun. III 58: Caranis in the Fifth Century.
bibl.note: Restored version of P. Haun. III, 58, of 15 May AD 439, a sworn declaration about water rights, certainly the latest dated document from Caranis. Suggestions relate to the prescript and to the letter group katinon, representing a transliteration of the Latin word catinus, 'basin'. <katinon>
REA John, P. Haun. III 58: Caranis in the Fifth Century.
